name: Escape from Zoo Island
description:
Mini metroidvania, gain abilities to interact with animals.

This game was made as a part of the 1 week game jam GNOJ#6 , Theme: Relation.

--Controls--

Jump - Space / Z

Move - Arrow keys / WASD

Catapult - C / Right click

Notes

The idea for the game was to make abilities that would expand the way the player interacts with animals. The "bounce on contact" and "feed to be come friends", which are in the game. Also a pet / shout, which would affect their movement, and a ride ability. These two was harder to implement in a interesting way, and would need to be made specifically for each animal, because of how little they overlap between each other. Maybe I will try that in a different game.
